description:
RPG Tkool VX Ace(RPGツクールVX Ace) Runtime package for Japanese.
Some games made by RPG Tkool VX Ace (for Japanese) depends on this package.
It contains graphics, musics, DLLs and so on.


**Please Note**: This is an automatically updated package. If you find it is 
out of date by more than a day or two, please contact the maintainer(s) and
let them know the package is no longer updating correctly.
summary: RPG Tkool VX Ace(RPGツクールVX Ace) Runtime package for Japanese
author: KADOKAWA CORPORATION
